column4: hi everybody.. is there a solution to prevent the beep sound on startup and shutdown? my sound scheme is adjusted for no sounds though!!!
you can blacklist the pcspkr module all together and prevent your pc speaker from going off ever
you will be able to play music. It only stops the pc speaker for making any "beeps"
in a terminal type in sudo nano /etc/modules.d/blacklist and add in the line blacklist pcspkr
